title: Interpretation of a dream about catching tilapia fish by hand for senior imams

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about catching tilapia by hand? The interpretation of a dream about catching tilapia fish by hand is a topic that many observers are searching for, as fishing is considered a widespread hobby among young people, as it is considered a profession for some, and fishing has different methods such as the hook and the net. Or even catching with the hand, and each method has a different meaning if it appears in the dream and through different people. We will learn about the interpretation of the dream of catching tilapia fish by hand. Interpretation of the dream of Al-Sayyidi, Ibn Sirin, that seeing fishing in a dream has many meanings, because catching a big fish means an abundance of goodness or achieving Something that the dreamer desires, and fish with a lot of meat indicates a lawful livelihood and a lot of money. Smooth fish scale indicates the dreamer's safety from deceiving others. Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a hook: If the dreamer sees that he is catching a fish with a hook, and has actually caught a big fish, this indicates abundant kindness and a lot of food. Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a net: To dream of fishing with a net means happy or joyful news and a lot of food. Goodness. Net fishing means lawful profit and abundant livelihood. This vision may indicate a desire to control others. Having a fish in the net in a dream means a calm and happy life. If the fish dies in the net, this indicates bad luck. Interpretation of a dream about hand fishing by Ibn SirinWho dreams of fishing A large fish means that he will achieve goodness and benefit in this world or that he will achieve something he desires. Seeing fish with tender meat indicates ease of life, nutrition, and halal money. Fishing by hand can indicate small projects that the dreamer has recently started and expects a return from them. This vision can indicate honesty. Work ethic, diligence, skill, and enduring hardships to reap the reward in the end. It can also mean making decisions very carefully and slowly. Interpretation of dreams about catching tilapia by hand. Interpretation of a dream about catching tilapia fish by hand is good, and this vision is one of the good dreams. Watching the fishing of tilapia indicates the presence of great livelihoods in the country. Neighborhood. If a person sees himself trying to catch tilapia with his hand, but does not do so, this indicates his failure to achieve what he desires. Interpretation of a dream about catching tilapia by hand can be successful in achieving the desired goals. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by hand for a young manIf a young man sees himself diving into Water and catching a large fish, this indicates unhappiness in life or the presence of fraudsters in his life and he must beware of his companions. Catching fish from fresh water is a sign of abundance of money and blessings. Seeing him catching a large whale fish indicates that he committed a major crime and was punished. If it is a type Fish is delicious and good and edible, as this indicates the permissibility of his livelihood and money. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for single women: If she sees herself fishing, this indicates good news, kindness, food, and benefit. It may indicate the approach of marriage and its benefits. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by hand for a married woman. Fishing by hand for a married woman is a sign of Being kind to her, her husband, and her children. Her catching scaly fish may herald her pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by hand for a pregnant woman: seeing a woman

title: Interpretation of seeing wearing a suit in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a suit in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing yourself wearing a suit in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of wearing a suit in a dream, depending on the condition of the viewer. And his circumstances, whether he is single or single, married or pregnant. Today, through the Ruya website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing wearing a suit in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin wearing a suit in a dream? I see myself wearing a suit in a dream, and it appears that the dreamer will get rid of All the difficulties and problems in his life. I see myself wearing a suit in a dream. It also indicates that the monarch will soon reach an important position in his career. See also: Interpretation of seeing a suit in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a man wearing a suit in a dream? Seeing a man wearing a suit in a dream indicates that he will achieve He will achieve great success in his work and he will gain great importance and prestige. Seeing a man wearing a suit in a dream indicates that many positive changes will appear in his life during the coming period. Seeing a man wearing a suit in a dream also indicates that the fortuneteller is obtaining profits and gains from his work. See also: I dreamed that someone What gave me clothes? What is the interpretation of seeing a young man wearing a suit in a dream? Seeing a young man wearing a black suit in a dream indicates that promising things will happen to him in his life, which will be a reason to feel happiness and joy. Seeing a young man wearing a black suit in a dream shows that he will soon marry a girl of great beauty and elegance. Seeing a young man wearing a white suit in a dream indicates his future married life full of happiness, stability and satisfaction. See also: Interpretation of seeing envy in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a suit in a dream for a single woman? Seeing single women wearing a suit in a dream shows that he will get married soon. Seeing a single man wearing a suit Black in a dream indicates that she will have a romantic relationship with this person in the future. Seeing a single woman wearing a suit in a dream shows that something happy will happen to her in the near future. Seeing single women in a yellow bucket in a dream announces that she will marry someone who does not suit her and that her married life will be miserable, by God. I know. Seeing a single woman wearing a suit in a dream indicates that her condition and life will improve for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing a man in a black suit in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a suit in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman in a suit in a dream indicates that something nice happened in her husband’s professional life Seeing a married woman in an old suit in a dream indicates many disagreements and problems between her and her husband, which may lead to their divorce. Seeing a married woman in a white suit in a dream indicates that God will bless her with a lot of goodness and sustenance in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing New clothes in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a suit in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman in a suit in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy and

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lover in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: We may actually experience some bad or good experiences that connect us with new people and relationships in which we feel safe and loved, and the most important thing said here is the interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream. Loss of consciousness or longing for what a person has suffered and we may talk about the lover as a husband, and in this case the vision indicates the consolidation of the marital relationship between them and perhaps the great happiness and intimacy that unites them. His mind and thought with the lover. In this article, you have everything related to seeing a lover in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lover in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that repeatedly seeing a person you love in your dream is not commendable and indicates serious harm and troubles for the dreamer in his upcoming life, especially if the love is one-sided. However, if someone sees that his lover ignores him or belittles him and his conversation with him, this is a sign that the dreamer has faced serious problems and difficulties in life or that he will be humiliated and broken. But if you see that the person you love is looking at you and smiling, this vision is commendable and reflects happiness and hope in life and the ability to achieve goals and aspirations in the future. Seeing the person you love speaking forcefully and looking at you with extreme anger is a vision that indicates the emergence of some sharp changes and tensions in the coming period, especially at the family level, and it may indicate sharp differences in married life. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a single dream An unmarried woman who sees her lover in a dream indicates that she thinks about him a lot, and this dream may be the result of subconscious thoughts and longing for her. A single woman’s vision of past lovers may indicate many feelings that connect them to each other Some may not know a clear future for this relationship. Thinking about loved ones constantly reflects the details of the vision and dream and can be nostalgic for the past and fades with time. Interpretation of a married woman seeing her lover in a dream A married woman who sees her lover in a dream may indicate evidence of the marital or family instability that she is experiencing now, and this may indicate the many difficulties in her life that lead to longing for the past with everything in it. Seeing a married person as someone other than her husband is bad and a sign of problems in the marital relationship and may lead to divorce. Imam Al-Sadiq explained the married woman's point of view for her ex-lover in a dream about the mind being preoccupied with him and the inability to forget him, which brings her misery and sadness. Interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing her lover in a dream A pregnant woman may see her old lover in her dream, and this may be due to the negative feelings and pregnancy disorders that the woman is going through during this period and everything she wishes to come true. Seeing a lover with an evil face in a dream means dissatisfaction, lack of conviction, and a feeling of despair. A pregnant woman seeing her lover may indicate nostalgia for the past and a desire to restore relationships as they were, and perhaps a fixed vision of her husband's betrayal. The paradox of the lover indicates In a dream, it indicates the absence of a strong relationship or affection in reality. Farewell to her lover indicates the strength of the husband’s love and loyalty. Interpretation of seeing the lover

Interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing her lover in a dream: A pregnant woman may see her old lover in her dream, and this may be due to the negative feelings and pregnancy disorders that the woman experiences during this period, and everything she hopes for will come true. A lover with an evil face in a dream means dissatisfaction, lack of conviction and a feeling of hopelessness. A pregnant woman’s vision of her lover may indicate nostalgia for the past and a desire to restore relationships as they were, and perhaps a fixed vision of her husband’s betrayal. The paradox of a lover in a dream indicates the lack of a strong relationship or affection in reality Farewell to her lover indicates the strength of the husband’s love and loyalty. title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage: Seeing marriage in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a marriage in a dream for a single girl, married, pregnant woman, divorced, to a man, either marriage or intercourse with an unknown or well-known person. She dreamed of marrying Ibn Sirin, Imam Sadiq and others. Interpretation of marriage in a dream. Marriage in a dream indicates a noble position, and every marriage in which semen is seen in A dream that one takes a bath while awake is invalid and has no explanation. Because it is a wet dream. He marries his mother, sister, or one of his female relatives during the holy months; Because he sets foot on the land of the Sanctuary. Whoever dreams that he marries his mother in the grave, he will die. Whoever sees that the caliph marries him will have a guardianship, and whoever marries a bird will gain an enemy, and if he recognizes the bird, he will be kind to those who do not see him. His people have made the world difficult for him, and whoever marries a naked woman will be saved from his troubles. Whoever dreams that he marries a seven will triumph over his enemy, whoever he is. Whoever dreams of marrying a lioness will be saved from many difficulties, will be victorious, will be victorious, and will be at the head of his cause, and will be great and full of hope among the people. And whoever sees that he is a monster who marries will do well. And if there are seven, then he will see what he hates from his enemy. Whoever dreams of marrying a young woman will be forbidden to a maid. Whoever sees himself marrying a tiger will gain power over a woman from the people of darkness. Whoever dreams of having intercourse with one of his other thighs will marry his relatives. Whoever dreams of marrying an adulteress, imposing a forbidden world, and whoever marries his wife He will achieve what he tries to do in the affairs of his branch. Whoever dreams of marrying one of the women of Paradise, he will suffer from religious matters in their beauty. Whoever dreams that he is marrying one of the virgins of Paradise, he will listen to religion with pleasure and do good in secret. Interpretation of a dream about marriage. Marriage in a dream indicates a noble status, and every marriage In which semen appears in a dream and he is forced to bathe while awake, it is invalid and has no explanation because it is a dream. Whoever kills his enemy will defeat him. Whoever marries one of his mahrams steps on the soil of the Haram. Whoever dreams of marrying his mother in the grave will die. If you see an enemy of infidels marrying a Muslim woman, this is evidence of raiding. Marriage means Settle debts and remove worries. Whoever marries a naked woman will save him from troubles. Whoever dreams of marrying an adulteress falls into a forbidden world. Whoever dreams that he is marrying women in Paradise will be influenced by religion. Whoever dreams that he is looking at a naked woman without knowing it is wrong. Interpretation of marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirino. It indicates a noble position, and whoever marries his enemy. Defeated by Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of marriage in a dream. The dream indicates a noble position, and every marriage in which semen is seen in a dream until one takes a bath while awake is invalid and has no explanation. Because it is a wet dream. He marries his mother, sister, or one of his female relatives during the holy months. Because he sets foot on the land of the Sanctuary. Whoever dreams of marrying his mother in the grave will die. Whoever sees him marrying the Caliph will obtain guardianship, and whoever marries a bird will win the enemy, and if he recognizes the bird, he will be kind to the one who does not see it. Ordinary people make it difficult for him. In this world, whoever marries a naked woman will be saved from his troubles. Whoever dreams that he marries seven people will be victorious over his enemy, whoever he may be. Whoever dreams of marrying a lioness will be saved from many hardships, will be victorious, surpass his rank, and will be great and full of hope among the people. Whoever dreams that he is a monster will get married, even if he is At seven, he will see from his enemy what he hates. - Whoever dreams of getting married

Whoever kills his enemy will defeat him. Whoever marries one of his mahrams steps on the soil of the Haram. Whoever dreams of marrying his mother in the grave will die. Whoever dreams of marrying an adulteress falls into a forbidden world. Whoever dreams that he is marrying women in Paradise will be influenced by religion. Whoever dreams that he is looking at a naked woman without knowing it is wrong. Interpretation of marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirino. It indicates a noble position, and whoever marries his enemy. Defeated by Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of marriage in a dream. The dream indicates a noble position, and every marriage in which semen is seen in a dream until one takes a bath while awake is invalid and has no explanation. Because it is a wet dream. He marries his mother, sister, or one of his female relatives during the holy months. Because he sets foot on the land of the Sanctuary. Whoever dreams of marrying his mother in the grave will die. Whoever sees him marrying the Caliph will obtain guardianship, and whoever marries a bird will win the enemy, and if he recognizes the bird, he will be kind to the one who does not see it. Ordinary people make it difficult for him. In this world, whoever marries a naked woman will be saved from his troubles. Whoever dreams that he marries seven people will be victorious over his enemy, whoever he may be. Whoever dreams of marrying a lioness will be saved from many hardships, will be victorious, surpass his rank, and will be great and full of hope among the people. Whoever dreams that he is a monster will get married, even if he is At seven, he will see from his enemy what he hates. - Whoever dreams of getting married

title: Interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Isha prayer in a dream for a single girl. She also performed the Isha prayer alone in a dream in her room and felt happy and reassured. The dream symbolizes her connection to a man with good morals that every girl desires, and her life with him will be happiness and peace of mind. An unmarried woman seeing in a dream that she is praying without performing ablution. It symbolizes that she is doing something that displeases God and she has to turn away from it and make a decision that changes her life for the better. The muezzin heard the evening prayer, and as soon as he heard the call, he began to pray. A sign of the happy news that changes the dreamer’s life that she had wished for before. Evening prayer on blessed days. Like the month of Ramadan and Laylat al-Qadr, with all reverence and consolation. The dream shows that this girl is obedient to her family and to God Almighty, loves kindness, and helps those around her with love. The sadness that the girl feels in a dream while performing the evening prayer. It indicates problems in her work and she is trying to find a solution and get rid of this problem. As quickly as possible. See also: Interpretation of a dream about praying in the Grand Mosque in Mecca for a married woman. Interpretation of attending the evening prayer in a dream for a married woman. The married woman heard the call for dinner and began to perform ablution and got up to pray before it was too late. The interpretation of this is comfort, happiness, and compatibility between her and her husband and the decent life they enjoy. Interpretation of a married woman who was attending the afternoon prayer and preparing for the prayer. It indicates the amount of happy news that the dreamer will be happy to hear, which she has been trying to achieve for a long time. Also, she does not feel comfortable and sad while praying or just listening to the call to prayer. It indicates instability, comfort and problems that It surrounds the reader in her relationship with her husband and his relatives. Does a woman pray the evening prayer with her husband in a dream? It indicates the closeness of the spouses to each other, their obedience to God, and indicates a happy life between them based on love. - Attending the evening prayer, but it was noisy and annoying. This indicates However, this woman does something that disturbs her neighbors and those around her, so many people stay away from her. Seeing a married woman swaying during the afternoon prayer and being unstable. Indicates instability in life and not following the correct path to walk in. Hearing the invitation to dinner in a married woman’s dream, but she forgot to She performed it and slept. It refers to the woman’s worries that distract her from performing her school duties. She must be careful and arrange herself to perform her duties and not be distracted from them. Interpretation of the appearance of the evening prayer in a dream for a man and its meaning: Seeing the same man praying the evening prayer in the mosque. An indication of the person’s character in reality. And his commitment to the duties of Almighty God, and his closeness to God. Likewise, a person feels joy and happiness during his sleep while performing the evening prayer. It indicates the fulfillment of that man’s dreams and may indicate his happy marital relationship and that his wife is a good wife and has the fear of God within her. Seeing the same man praying Performing the evening prayer at home and not wanting to go to the mosque to pray is an indication of difficulties and problems in the dreamer’s life and may indicate large debts that he cannot pay.

title: Interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Dogs are among the animals that Islam forbade breeding in homes because they prevent angels from entering the home and bring evil to its inhabitants. We will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white dog in a dream, Ibn Sirin's interpretation Imam Ibn Sirin went to interpret the vision of a white dog in a dream as an indication that the dreamer has a talent and does not realize its importance in reality. Seeing a white dog in a dream indicates good morals of honesty and loyalty. As for seeing a white puppy in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has the ability to bear the responsibility that falls on his shoulders in reality. Seeing a white puppy in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a generous person and loves to help others. As for seeing a white dog bite in a dream, this vision expresses the problems and crises that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Seeing a sick white dog in a dream symbolizes the dreamer's relationship with his friends and the problems he faces from them. If you see a white dog feeding in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is an ambitious person looking for positive changes and developing his abilities. Seeing a white dog in a dream means that the dreamer will escape from many dangers in reality. If the dreamer sees that he receives a white dog from a familiar woman in a dream, this is a sign that this woman is a source of trouble for him in reality. Interpretation Dream of seeing a dog attacking in a dream If the dreamer sees that white dogs are attacking him in a dream and he manages to escape from them, this is a sign of salvation from the problems that cause him harm in reality. When the dreamer sees that he is playing with a white dog and is attacked in a dream, this means that he is facing a problem from his friends. If the dreamer sees himself being attacked and chased by white dogs in a dream and succeeds in killing them, this means that the dreamer has succeeded in achieving what he wants and overcoming the obstacles that stood between his desires. Interpretation of a dream of seeing white dogs for unmarried women in a dream Seeing a white dog in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of her marriage to a righteous man with good morals. When an unmarried woman sees a white puppy in a dream, this indicates her relationship with a young man who is morally committed, and God knows best. Seeing a wild white dog in a dream symbolizes a person she knows who is trying to harm her in reality. If an unmarried woman sees a white dog in her house in a dream, this vision expresses her deception by someone around her in reality. If a single woman sees that she is afraid of a white dog in a dream, this dream symbolizes the crises she is going through In reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing white dogs for a married woman in a dream If a married woman dreams of buying a white dog, this is a sign that things will change for the better, as it is a good thing for her that worries and sorrows end and married life stabilizes. As for if a married woman sees that her husband bought her a white dog, this dream is one of the hated dreams that express his deception

Let us read the details of the vision from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream for a single girl. Seeing oranges in a dream for an unmarried girl is one of the dreams that indicate goodness and success, God willing. If he saw himself cutting oranges with someone he does not know in a single girl’s dream, the vision may indicate that you will marry this person soon. Whereas if he saw that he was cutting oranges from a large orchard in a dream, it is a sign of success and distinction, whether at work, study, or Life in general. In another interpretation, we see that picking oranges from the orchard. It is a sign of achieving a goal that he was striving to achieve in life. Interpretation of seeing that someone cuts an orange from a tree and gives it to her in a single girl’s dream. It is evidence of marrying the person she loves and desires. In it, God willing. Seeing buying oranges in a dream can be interpreted as a single girl. Get what she wants and she will obtain a prominent position among the people around her. The vision indicated marital happiness and family stability. However, if she saw that he was cutting oranges from the tree in a married woman’s dream. The vision indicated It indicates that she seeks to achieve many successes related to her children. Interpretation of seeing picking oranges from an orchard in a married woman’s dream. It is evidence of many goals and aspirations that she seeks to achieve with the help of God Almighty. It symbolizes the vision of buying exciting oranges in a married woman’s dream. To strive Follow what you desire in life and achieve those goals. A dream about oranges shows many, many people with him in a married woman’s dream. She works to please everyone around her and strives for good. Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream for a man and its meaningWhen a married man sees that his wife gives him oranges in a dream. It indicates mutual love, respect, and happiness between spouses. Or if he sees that he is eating oranges in a dream of marriage. The vision showed many good things, and the enormous food that God Almighty will bring to him. In the event that a married man sees that there are many people eating oranges, and they are delicious In a dream. The vision may indicate that you hear a lot of good news and that the road belongs to the visionary. Interpretation of seeing oranges picked from a tree and that tree was in the house in a married man’s dream. It is a sign of the calm and stability that prevails in his home, God willing. Whereas if a married man sees In a dream, he is buying oranges from the market. The vision indicated that he will find a prestigious job in the near future, God willing. A married man dreams that he is selling oranges in a dream. Indications of the good news that will come to him in the next few days, God willing. And if the married man sees that he is feeding His wife is righteous

title: The most important interpretations of seeing snow in a dream, Wassim Youssef

preview.html: Seeing snow in a dream, according to Waseem Yousef, is one of the good visions that have many good meanings, as seeing snow comforts the exhausted soul in real life, and snow with its pure white color shows abundant blessings, so snow in a dream, according to Waseem Yousef, expresses the end of fire problems and Crises and extinction with avalanches, snowfall, and many other interpretations that vary depending on the nature of the snow, the way it falls, the viewer’s reaction to it, and many other different situations. Seeing snow in a dream, Waseem YousefSeeing snow in a dream, Waseem YousefThe translator Waseem Yousef believes that seeing snow in a dream has There are many good interpretations that have a lot of goodness, but the exact meaning of this dream is determined by the shape and form of the snow and how the dreamer treats it. Likewise, heavy snowfall indicates the abundance of blessings and gifts that the dreamer and his family will enjoy in the coming period, as he is about to obtain sufficient funds. To move his household to a better standard of living. Also, seeing white snow expresses the psychological comfort and reassurance that fills the heart of the dreamer, after he has been freed from all the problems and financial crises that he was exposed to during the past difficult period. As for the one who sees snowballs, this means that he will achieve Lots of profits and countless profits from those business projects that he just started, to gain great fame. When a person suffers from some problems in his body or complains of pain in his health, if he sees that he is eating snow in a dream, he will be cured of all the diseases that he complains of. And it will get better. Repeatedly.Seeing snow in a dream by Waseem Youssef for a single woman: Waseem Youssef says that an unmarried woman who sees snow falling abundantly around her, so that white snow covers the place where she stands, is a sign that she will soon marry the person she loves with great joy, in the presence of many loved ones. Let them all rejoice together. If an unmarried woman sees that she is carrying ice cubes and trying to make shapes out of them, this means that she knows well her path in life and how to achieve her ambitions and dreams in life, regardless of the difficulties or obstacles she faces. she has. Objects. Likewise, an unmarried woman who eats white snow is close to reaching a cherished goal that she has always wanted and wanted to achieve, but she will soon obtain it in exchange for her struggle and hard effort. Likewise, seeing snow falling in her room shows that she feels a state of psychological stability and calm at the time. The current one, where she lives in an emotional state full of emotions. While she is the one who sees someone feeding her with snow, this means that she will marry a very wealthy person and gain a large share of fame among those around her. Seeing snow in a dream for a married woman Waseem YousefWassem Yousef believes that the married woman who She sees snow falling from the sky. She enjoys a successful and stable family life, dominated by love and harmony between her husband and children, and the warmth of her simple home. While the wife was playing with snowballs in it

title: Do you know Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about dogs?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dogs: Seeing animals is a common vision in the world of dreams, and perhaps seeing a dog is one of the visions that a person sees during his sleep, so what is the significance of that? What is its importance? There were many connotations among jurists regarding seeing a dog, as the differences between them led them to say that there are cases in which the vision is of high value, while in other cases the vision is considered repulsive, and in the following points we consider all the cases and connotations of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about dogsDogs represent weakness. Enemies, tricks, conspiracies, and color as needed. A large dog resorts to a man who has knowledge and does not benefit from it. A small dog shows the evil of children. A dog attack expresses hostility on the part of worthless men. A dog’s saliva symbolizes bad words and words that are interpreted in more than one way. A dog barking indicates fever and illness, and hitting a dog with the body or tearing clothes indicates delusion in symptoms and cold hostility. The dog may be a symbol of a greedy and hateful man who rejects goodness, a mad dog shows a foolish enemy who is reckless in his hostility, and a dog quarrel suggests a dialogue between fools. Interpretation of a dream about dogs According to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin believes that dogs are deceived by weak people who lack dexterity and horsemanship, a dog is a corrupt and foolish man, and a dog is a deceitful woman who is deceived in satisfying her need. A mad dog indicates a thief, a treacherous thief, or a miser. A dog can symbolize someone who has knowledge but does not work with it, and wild dogs indicate men who have no morals or values. A dead dog symbolizes a corrupt heart, bad faith, and bad character. As for a slaughtered dog, it indicates lack of reason and ignorance, and stray dogs represent malice, hatred, and theft. Show A female dog is a woman whose opinion is not taken into consideration. A dog bite represents pain, fatigue, and a serious illness, and a bite followed by a flow of blood indicates material losses and defeats. Interpretation of a dream about dogs for single women: A dog symbolizes a man who lusts after her, bewitches her, and wants evil and evil in her. He is a man whom she does not trust and does not He deserves her trust, and the large number of dogs around her indicates someone who lusts after her or desires her. Bad owners. A dog bite means harm from a weak young man, and a white dog symbolizes someone who shows her love and covers her hostility, and running away from dogs expresses salvation and deliverance from worries and evils. Feeding dogs is a symbol of charity to the undeserving, and dogs that attack them represent the harm and exhaustion they reap from those Those who lack horsemanship, and killing dogs is evidence of comfort, stability, and security. Interpretation of seeing guard dogs in a dream for a single woman. Guard dogs indicate someone who pretends to guard and protect her, and may harm him, and disappoint her after the trust she places in him. If a guard dog attacks her, this indicates treachery and betrayal. It will follow the whims of others, severe harm, and extreme sadness. If the dog obeys her words, this is a sign of dominance and status, with the need to be careful when dealing with others. Interpretation of a dream about dogs for a married woman: Dogs in a dream represent those who desire them and take away their comfort.

He is a man whom she does not trust and does not He deserves her trust, and the large number of dogs around her indicates someone who lusts after her or desires her. Bad owners. A dog bite means harm from a weak young man, and a white dog symbolizes someone who shows her love and covers her hostility, and running away from dogs expresses salvation and deliverance from worries and evils. Feeding dogs is a symbol of charity to the undeserving, and dogs that attack them represent the harm and exhaustion they reap from those Those who lack horsemanship, and killing dogs is evidence of comfort, stability, and security. Interpretation of seeing guard dogs in a dream for a single woman. Guard dogs indicate someone who pretends to guard and protect her, and may harm him, and disappoint her after the trust she places in him. If a guard dog attacks her, this indicates treachery and betrayal. It will follow the whims of others, severe harm, and extreme sadness. If the dog obeys her words, this is a sign of dominance and status, with the need to be careful when dealing with others. Interpretation of a dream about dogs for a married woman: Dogs in a dream represent those who desire them and take away their comfort.
